titleStmt.title: The debauchee, or, The credulous cuckold a comedy acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A29636 of text R6961 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing B4869). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 170 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 36 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: The debauchee, or, The credulous cuckold a comedy acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Brome, Richard, d. 1652? Madd couple well matcht.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

An anonymous alteration of "A madd couple well matcht." Not included in Summer's edition of Mrs. Behn's Works, 1915, though the editor thinks "it is no doubt from her pen," and that "all the best critics with one accord ascribe it to her." cf. v. 1, p.xxxvi.
